sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"保证"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ensure, insure, assure, guarantee, pledge, promise
means: ensure ： 侧重使人相信某个行为或力量产生的结果。
insure常与ensure换用，但前者多指经济方面的保证、保险。
assure ： 侧重指消除某人思想上的怀疑或担心，从而有达到目的的保证感，但不如ensure普通。
guarantee ： 指对事物的品质或人的行为及履行义务、义务等承担责任的保证。
pledge ： 正式用词，指通过郑重许诺、协议或立誓等保证承担某一义务或遵守某一原则。
promise ： 侧重表自己的主观意向，设法用语言使人感到稳当可靠。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"保证，担保"之意。
means: pledge ： 普通用词，指严肃地承诺、信守原则，常以个人名誉作为承诺的保证。
guarantee ： 一般指以口头的、协定或合同的形式作为保证、担保，强调口头承诺，含违背许诺，则予以补偿之意。
assurance ： 指用语言保证以消除人们思想上的怀疑与担心。

sentence.Network_en: He argues strongly for retention of NATO as a guarantee of peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 他强烈要求保留北大西洋公约组织以维护和平。

sentence.Network_en: We guarantee that you will find a community with which to socialise.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们保证你们会找到自己的交际圈。

sentence.Network_en: The Editor can give no guarantee that they will fulfil their obligations.
sentence.Network_cn: 《编辑家》无法保证他们会履行职责.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in the sense 'guarantor'): perhaps from Spanish garante, corresponding to French garant (see warrant), later influenced by French garantie 'guaranty'

entry.def: If one thing guarantees another, the first is certain to cause the second thing to happen.

example.ex: Surplus resources alone do not guarantee growth.
example.tran: 仅有富余的资源并不能确保发展。

example.ex: ...a man whose fame guarantees that his calls will nearly always be returned.
example.tran: 其名望能确保他的呼吁几乎总能得到回应的人

entry.def: Something that is a guarantee of something else makes it certain that it will happen or that it is true.

example.ex: A famous old name on a firm is not necessarily a guarantee of quality...
example.tran: 公司悠久的品牌并不能确保商品的质量。

example.ex: There is still no guarantee that a formula could be found.
example.tran: 还没有把握是否能找到一个配方。

entry.tran: 保证…必定发生；承诺做；答应提供
entry.def: If you guarantee something, you promise that it will definitely happen, or that you will do or provide it for someone.

example.ex: Most states guarantee the right to free and adequate education...
example.tran: 大多数州都保障人们免费享受充分教育的权利。

example.ex: All students are guaranteed campus accommodation for their first year...
example.tran: 保证安排所有的学生第一年在校内住宿。

entry.def: A guarantee is a written promise by a company to replace or repair a product free of charge if it has any faults within a particular time.

example.ex: Whatever a guarantee says, when something goes wrong, you can still claim your rights from the shop...
example.tran: 不论保修单如何规定，若商品出了问题，消费者仍然可以去商店维护自身权益。

entry.def: If a company guarantees its product or work, they provide a guarantee for it.

example.tran: 一些建筑公司对其承建工程提供质量保证。

example.ex: All Dreamland's  electric blankets are guaranteed for three years.
example.tran: 所有的梦乡牌电热毯质保3年。

entry.def: A guarantee is money or something valuable which you give to someone to show that you will do what you have promised.

example.ex: Males between 18 and 20 had to leave a deposit as a guarantee of returning to do their military service.
example.tran: 18至20岁的男性必须缴纳一笔保证金，作为回来服兵役的担保。

means.word_mean: 1. a written assurance that some product or service will be provided or will meet certain specifications
2. a pledge that something will happen or that something is true;

sentences.sentence: "there is no guarantee that they are not lying"

means.word_mean: 3. a collateral agreement to answer for the debt of another in case that person defaults

sentences.sentence: "I vouch for the quality of my products"
"This nest egg will ensure a nice retirement for us"

means.word_mean: 4. stand behind and guarantee the quality, accuracy, or condition of;

sentences.sentence: "The dealer warrants all the cars he sells"

auth_sentence.content: The government's new mortgage guarantee scheme is ambitious.
auth_sentence.res_content: The government's new mortgage guarantee scheme is ambitious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government's new mortgage guarantee scheme is ambitious.

auth_sentence.content: Focus on individual responsibility, guarantee of each other.
auth_sentence.res_content: Focus on individual responsibility, guarantee of each other.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Focus on individual responsibility, guarantee of each other.

auth_sentence.content: We're going to need some sort of guarantee.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're going to need some sort of guarantee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're going to need some sort of guarantee.

Sentence.sentence: For investors who desire low risk and guaranteed income,U.S. Government bonds are a secure investment because these bonds have the financial backing and full faith and credit of the federal government.

Scholars will debate which interventions this time - the Federal Reserve's support of a failing credit system, guarantees of bank debt, Obama's ''stimulus" plan and bank "stress test" - counted most in preventing a recurrence.
Well, that's a good question, because the basic idea of chaos theory is that there aren't any "models" as such— there aren't guaranteed forms, but rather patterns of change in development

sentences.en: We can't guarantee our workers' regular employment.
sentences.cn: 我们不能保证我们的工人定期受雇。

sentences.en: We guarantee to be here tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 我保证你会过得很快活。

sentences.en: Can you guarantee me a job when I get there?
sentences.cn: 你可以确保我到那儿就可以找到一份工作吗?
我们可以保证它的纯度。

sentences.en: His turning up will guarantee the success of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他一出席, 会议便成功在望。

means.word_mean: 保证…免受损失(或伤害)；保证保护(或赔偿)；保障(常与 against， from 连用)

sentences.en: The policy guarantees us against all loss.
sentences.cn: 这项政策保证了我们免受全部损失。

sentences.en: The radio is guaranteed for twelve months.

means.word_mean: 使变得确定，(某事物)使(另一事物)必定发生

sentences.en: Simply making steel stronger does not necessarily guarantee freedom from laminar tearing.
sentences.cn: 仅仅增加钢强度并不能保证不发生片状撕裂。

means.word_mean: 保证, 保障; 保证书; 保用期

sentences.en: Can you give me your guarantee that the goods will be delivered before Friday?
sentences.cn: 你能给我保证这批货在星期五之前交货吗?

sentences.en: This guarantee is valid for one year.
sentences.cn: 这份保证书有效期为一年。

sentences.en: If I try to borrow 10, 000 from the bank, will you be my guarantee?
sentences.cn: 如果我向银行借一万美元, 你愿意作我的保证人吗?

jushi.english: We can't guarantee our workers' regular employment.
jushi.chinese: 我们不能保证我们的工人经常受雇。

jushi.english: Our goods are guaranteed, you may return any bad ones.
jushi.chinese: 我们的货物是有保证的,有问题可以退货。
